src_text: Elektrisiteit.
tgt_text: Electricity.

src_text: Die Kabinet het die bekendstelling van die Hulpbronmobilisasiefonds (RMF) deur die Minister van Elektrisiteit in die Presidensie, dr Kgosientsho Ramokgopa, verwelkom.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the Resource Mobilisation Fund (RMF) by the Minister of Electricity in The Presidency, Dr Kgosientsho Ramokgopa.

src_text: Hierdie samewerking tussen die regering en Business Unity South Africa poog om hulpbronne en kundigheid te voorsien om die regering in staat te stel om die Energie-aksieplan wat president Cyril Ramaphosa in Julie 2022 aangekondig het, en die 2023 Staatsrede (SoNA) effektief te implementeer as 'n voorbeeld van doeltreffende sosiale verdigting en volgehoue vertroue in Suid-Afrika.
tgt_text: This collaboration between government and Business Unity South Africa seeks to provide resources and expertise to enable government to effectively implement the Energy Action Plan announced by President Cyril Ramaphosa in July 2022 and the 2023 State of the Nation Address (SoNA) as an example of effective social compacting and continued confidence in South Africa..

src_text: Die RMF sal die werk van die Nasionale Energiekrisiskomitee ’n hupstoot gee om sy doelwit om beurtkrag in Suid-Afrika te beëindig, te bereik.
tgt_text: The RMF will boost the work of the National Energy Crisis Committee to achieve its goal of ending load-shedding in South Africa.

src_text: Die Kabinet het 'n beroep op alle belanghebbendes gedoen om by te dra tot die implementering van die Energie-aksieplan om die vernietigende uitwerking van beurtkrag op die ekonomie vas te vat.
tgt_text: Cabinet appealed to all stakeholders to contribute towards the implementation of the Energy Action Plan in order to tackle the heavy toll of load-shedding on the economy.

src_text: Die Kabinet het kennis geneem van die kommer wat onlangs deur S&P Global Ratings uitgepreek is dat Suid-Afrika se ekonomiese groei toenemende druk van infrastruktuurbeperkings, veral ernstige elektrisiteitstekorte ervaar.
tgt_text: Cabinet noted the concerns raised recently by S&P Global Ratings that South Africa’s economic growth was facing increasing pressure from infrastructure constraints, particularly severe electricity shortages.

src_text: Om hierdie uitdaging die hoof te bied, het die regering sedertdien 'n reeks beslissende stappe geneem, wat fiskale konsolidasie, vinnige ekonomiese hervormings en dringende optrede insluit.
tgt_text: To address this challenge, government has since embarked on series of decisive actions, which include fiscal consolidation, rapid economic reforms and urgent actions aimed at reducing load-shedding in the short term and transforming the sector through market reforms to achieve long-term energy security.

src_text: Dit is daarop gemik om beurtkrag op kort termyn te verminder en die sektor deur markhervormings te transformeer om langtermyn-energiesekuriteit te verseker.
tgt_text: Cabinet also welcomed the opening of bid window for 513 megawatts (MW) of battery storage capacity as part of strengthening our response to the energy challenge.

src_text: Die Kabinet het ook die opening van ‘n bodvenster vir batterybergingskapasiteit van 513 megawatt (MW) as deel van die versterking van ons reaksie op die energie-uitdaging verwelkom.
tgt_text: The closing date for the bid submissions is 5 July 2023 at 17:00 and all interested parties can complete the online electronic registration form available at: www.ipp-storage.co.za.

src_text: Die sluitingsdatum vir die bodvoorleggings is 5 Julie 2023 om 17:00; alle belangstellendes kan die aanlyn elektroniese registrasievorm voltooi wat by: www.ipp-storage.co.za beskikbaar is.
tgt_text: Cabinet also welcomed the decision by Minister of Forestry, Fisheries and the Environment, Ms Barbara Creecy, to grant Eskom an exemption from the lengthy process required to amend its Atmospheric Emission Licence.

src_text: Die Kabinet het ook die Minister van Bosbou, Visserye en die Omgewing, me Barbara Creecy,  se besluit verwelkom om Eskom vry te stel van die lang proses wat nodig is om sy Atmosferiese Emissielisensie te wysig.
tgt_text: According to Eskom, this exemption will enable it to implement temporary solution to the damage at Kusile Power Station by November 2023 and thus allow the power station to resume generation capacity of 2 100 megawatts (MW) which will reduce South Africa’s exposure to load-shedding by two levels..     National Education, Health and Allied Workers’ Union (NEHAWU) strike.

src_text: Volgens Eskom sal hierdie vrystelling die energieverskaffer in staat stel om 'n tydelike oplossing vir die skade by Kusile Kragstasie teen November 2023 te implementeer.
tgt_text: On the NEHAWU strike, Cabinet welcomed the signing of the Settlement Agreement at the Public Service Coordinating Bargaining Council (PSCBC) that settles the 2022/23  wage negotiations and ends the strike as well as brings all parties back to the Bargaining Council for the 2023/24 wage negotiations.

src_text: Die kragstasie sal derhalweopwekkingskapasiteit van 2 100 megawatt (MW) kan hervat, wat Suid-Afrika se blootstelling aan beurtkrag deur twee vlakke sal verminder.
tgt_text: Cabinet further expressed its appreciation to those trade unions that remained in the PSCBC to continue with negotiations.

src_text: National Education, Health and Allied Workers' Union (NEHAWU) staak.
tgt_text: It reiterated government’s commitment to the bargaining process, and to working with all relevant partners to ensure that the primacy of collective bargaining is protected and respected..     We need to indicate that the principle of NO WORK, NO PAY will apply with immediate effect and the deductions will be done over the next four months, as part of the Settlement Agreement.

src_text: Met betrekking tot die NEHAWU-staking, het die Kabinet die ondertekening van die Skikkingsooreenkoms by die Staatsdiens se Koördinerende Bedingingsraad (PSCBC) verwelkom.
tgt_text: The Department of Public Service and Administration will monitor the full implementation of these decisions.

src_text: Die ooreenkoms skik die 2022/23-loononderhandelinge en beëindig die staking.
tgt_text: In addition, law-enforcement agencies will follow up on criminal acts that were committed during the strike, whilst respective managers will attend to acts that violated the Code of Conduct for Public Servants..     National shutdown.

src_text: Dit bring ook alle partye terug na die Bedingingsraad vir die 2023/24 loononderhandelinge.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed concern over calls for protest action planned for Monday, 20 March 2023 and deems such calls as irresponsible and reckless..

src_text: Die Kabinet het ook sy waardering uitgespreek teenoor die vakbonde wat in die PSCBC gebly het om onderhandelinge voort te sit.
tgt_text: The Justice, Crime Prevention and Security (JCPS) Cluster is engaged with work to ensure that lawlessness is not tolerated.

src_text: Dit het die regering se verbintenis tot die bedingingsproses bevestig, asook om met al die betrokke vennote saam te werk om te verseker dat die voorrang van kollektiewe bedinging beskerm en gerespekteer word.
tgt_text: The alleged demands about ending load-shedding, high cost of living and high unemployment rate were addressed by President Ramaphosa during the SoNA on 9 February.

src_text: Ons beklemtoon dat die beginsel van GEEN WERK, GEEN BETALING dadelik in werking sal tree en dat die aftrekkings oor die volgende vier maande, as deel van die Skikkingsooreenkoms, gedoen sal word.
tgt_text: Specific on ending load-shedding, the President has appointed Minister of Electricity, Dr Ramokgopa, who is solely focused on ending load-shedding.

src_text: Die Departement van Staatsdiens en Administrasie sal die volle implementering van hierdie besluite monitor.
tgt_text: The implementation of the Five-Point Energy Action Plan is underway in earnest and the Minister of Electricity will in the coming weeks announce Eskom’s performance targets towards ending load-shedding..

src_text: Hierbenewens sal wetstoepassingsagentskappe kriminele dade wat tydens die staking gepleeg is, opvolg, terwyl die onderskeie bestuurders aandag sal gee aan dade wat die Gedragskode vir Staatsamptenare oortree het.
tgt_text: Equally, the President in his 2023 SoNA addressed measures put in place to address high levels of youth unemployment and the cost of living.

src_text: Nasionale protesoptrede.
tgt_text: Therefore, the only demand which is the basis of this protest action is the plan to remove President Ramaphosa from office through unconstitutional means.

src_text: Die Kabinet het sy kommer uitgespreek oor oproepe tot protesaksie wat vir Maandag 20 Maart 2023 beplan word en beskou sulke oproepe as onverantwoordelik en roekeloos.
tgt_text: We want to inform all that REGIME CHANGE THROUGH UNCONSTITUTIONAL MEANS WILL NOT HAPPEN IN SOUTH AFRICA.

src_text: Die regering se gropering virJustisie, Misdaadvoorkoming en Sekuriteit (JCPS) maak tans werk daarvan om te verseker dat wetteloosheid nie geduld word nie.
tgt_text: Anyone with ambitions to govern this country must wait to contest the 2024 general elections.

src_text: President Ramaphosa het tydens sy Staatsrede op 9 Februarie 2023, die beweerde eise dat beurtkrag beëindiging moet word, asook protes oor die hoë lewenskoste en die hoë werkloosheidsyfer bespreek.
tgt_text: Attempts to cause disruption and disturbances in the country will be met with the full might of the law.

src_text: Wat die beëindiging van beurtkrag betref, het die President 'n Minister van Elektrisiteit, dr Ramokgopa, aangestel, wat uitsluitlik daarop sal fokus om beurtkrag te beëindig.
tgt_text: We must also clarify that no amount of political adventurism should not sway any South Africans..

src_text: Die implementering van die Vyfpunt-energie-aksieplan is in alle erns aan die gang en die Minister van Elektrisiteit sal in die komende weke Eskom se prestasieteikens vir die beëindiging van beurtkrag aankondig..
tgt_text: The Cabinet has also noted the hallucination of groupings claiming to have given Cabinet seven days to close schools.

src_text: Die President het eweneens in sy 2023 Staatsrede maatreëls bespreek wat ingestel is om hoë vlakke van jeugwerkloosheid en lewenskoste die hoof te bied.
tgt_text: The South African schools calendar for both public and private schools, which was gazetted in March 2022, already provides for 20 March 2023 as special school holiday.

src_text: Daarom is die enigste doel wat die basis van hierdie protesaksie is, die plan om President Ramaphosa uit sy amp te verwyder deur ongrondwetlike middele.
tgt_text: It has always been clear that there are attempts to claim easy victories.

src_text: Ons wil dit duidelik stel dat BEWINDSVERANDERING DEUR ONGRONDWETLIKE MIDDELE NIE IN SUID-AFRIKA SAL GEBEUR NIE.
tgt_text: Similarly, with schools’ break in between public holiday.

src_text: Enigiemand wat daarna streef om hierdie land te regeer, moet wag om in die algemene verkiesing van 2024 mee te ding.
Pogings om ontwrigting en oproer in die land te veroorsaak sal met al die mag van die wet bestry word.
tgt_text: Presidential Youth Leadership Programme.

src_text: Ons maak dit ook duidelik dat geen mate van politieke avontuurlustigheid enige Suid-Afrikaners mag omswaai nie.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the launch of the Presidential Youth Leadership Programme by President Ramaphosa on 10 March 2023, at the Walter Sisulu University, Mthatha, which saw the establishment of Pan-African fellowship programme..

src_text: Die Kabinet het ook kennis geneem van die hallusinasies van sekere groepe wat beweer dat hulle die Kabinet sewe dae gegee het om skole te sluit.
tgt_text: This formed part of the inaugural session of the Nelson Mandela Youth Dialogue under the theme: “Ethical and intergenerational leadership for better Africa”.

src_text: Die Suid-Afrikaanse skolekalender vir beide openbare en private skole, wat in Maart 2022 gepubliseer is, maak reeds voorsiening vir 20 Maart 2023 as 'n spesiale skoolvakansie.
tgt_text: This intergenerational leadership platform strengthens existing continent-wide plans and agreements such as the African Union Agenda 2063, African Youth Charter and the African Continental Free Trade Area Agreement.

src_text: Dit was nog altyd duidelik dat daar pogings is om maklike oorwinnings te behaal.
tgt_text: Framework agreement to build cars in South Africa .

src_text: So ook met skole se vakansiedae tussenin 'n openbare vakansiedag.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the news that car company Stellantis South Africa has signed memorandum of understanding with the Industrial Development Corporation and the Department of Trade, Industry and Competition to develop new vehicle manufacturing facility in South Africa.

src_text: Presidensiële Jeugleierskapsprogram.
tgt_text: Stellantis sells Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel and Peugeot brands in South Africa.

src_text: Die Kabinet het die bekendstelling van die Presidensiële Jeugleierskapsprogram deur President Ramaphosa op 10 Maart 2023, verwelkom.
tgt_text: South Africa-Tanzania relations.

src_text: Dié program, wat by die Walter Sisulu Universiteit, Mthatha bekendgestel is, het tot die stigting van 'n Pan-Afrika-genootskapprogram gelei.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the State Visit to South Africa on Thursday, 16 March 2023 by President Samia Suluhu Hassan of the United Republic of Tanzania, at the invitation of her counterpart,  President Ramaphosa.

src_text: Dit het deel gevorm van die openingsessie van die Nelson Mandela Jeugdialoog onder die tema: "Etiese en intergenerasieleierskap vir 'n beter Afrika".
tgt_text: The visit follows the South Africa-Tanzania Ministerial Binational Commission (BNC) held in Pretoria on Wednesday, 15 March.

src_text: Hierdie intergenerasie-leierskapplatform versterk bestaande kontinentwye planne en ooreenkomste soos die Afrika-unie se Agenda 2063, die Afrika-jeughandves en die Afrika-kontinentale vryhandelsgebiedooreenkoms.
tgt_text: It will also crown the second session of the South Africa-Tanzania BNC, which comprises four committees: Political and Diplomatic; Defence and Security; Economic Affairs, and Social and Cultural Affairs.

src_text: Raamwerkooreenkoms om motors in Suid-Afrika te bou.
tgt_text: In addition to its solidarity with South Africa’s liberation struggle, Tanzania is one of the country’s foremost trading partners, with total trade between the two nations increasing from  89 billion in 2021 to  71 billion in.

src_text: Die Kabinet het die nuus verwelkom dat die motormaatskappy Stellantis Suid-Afrika 'n memorandum van verstandhouding met die Nywerheidsontwikkelingskorporasie en die Departement van Handel, Nywerheid en Mededinging onderteken het om 'n nuwe voertuigvervaardigingsaanleg in Suid-Afrika te ontwikkel.
tgt_text: There are more than 250 South African companies in diverse sectors in Tanzania.

src_text: Stellantis verkoop die handelsmerke vir Jeep, Alfa Romeo, Fiat, Citroën, Opel en Peugeot in Suid- Afrika .
tgt_text: Merger of Heineken and Distell.

src_text: Suid-Afrika-Tanzanië verhoudings.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the approval by the Competition Tribunal of the international merger of European brewer Heineken and South African alcohol producer Distell Group Holdings.

src_text: Die Kabinet het die staatsbesoek aan Suid-Afrika op Donderdag 16 Maart 2023 deur president Samia Suluhu Hassan van die Verenigde Republiek van Tanzanië, op uitnodiging van haar eweknie, president Ramaphosa, verwelkom.
tgt_text: The merger, which will create the largest cider manufacturer in the country, is subject to range of public interest conditions, which include the promotion of supplier development, maintenance of local procurement, promotion of investment in research and development and increased local manufacturing capacity..

src_text: Die besoek volg op die Suid-Afrika-Tanzanië Ministeriële Bi-nasionale Kommissie (BNC), wat op Woensdag 15 Maart 2023 in Pretoria gehou is.
tgt_text: The merged entity will also promote worker ownership by establishing an employee share ownership plan and giving workers board representation.

src_text: Dit sal ook die kroon span op die tweede sessie van die Suid-Afrika-Tanzanië BNC, wat uit vier komitees bestaan, naamlik Polities en Diplomaties; Verdediging en Veiligheid; Ekonomiese Sake, en Maatskaplike en Kultuursake.
tgt_text: 2022 Floods Relief Progress Monitoring.

src_text: Benewens sy solidariteit met Suid-Afrika se bevrydingstryd, is Tanzanië een van die land se voorste handelsvennote.
tgt_text: Cabinet welcomed the work undertaken by the Minister of Human Settlements, Ms  Mmamoloko Kubayi and Members of the Human Settlements MinMEC to monitor progresss with the permanent resettlement and accommodation of families affected by the  2022 floods in KwaZulu-Natal as the country approaches the first anniversary of the 2022 floods devastation that befell our country.

src_text: Algehele handel tussen die twee nasies het van R6,89 miljard in 2021 tot R8,71 miljard in 2022 toegeneem.
tgt_text: Misrepresentations about the Benefits of Ministers and Deputy Ministers.

src_text: Daar is meer as 250 Suid-Afrikaanse maatskappye in verskeie sektore in Tanzanië.
tgt_text: Cabinet expressed concern over the continued misrepresentation of the Benefits of Ministers and Deputy Ministers as covered in the Guide for Members of the Executive, which outlines the benefits, tools of trade and allowances for Members of the Executive to perform their duties efficiently.

src_text: Samesmelting van Heineken en Distell.
tgt_text: Ministerial Housing arrangements are result of the 1910 Consensus during the formation of the Union of South Africa that determined the three capitals for South Africa with Pretoria as the Seat of Government, Bloemfontein as the Seat of the Judiciary, and Cape Town as the Seat of Parliament.

src_text: Die Kabinet het die Mededingingstribunaal se goedkeuring van die internasionale samesmelting van die Europese brouer Heineken en die Suid-Afrikaanse alkoholprodusent Distell Group Holdings verwelkom.
tgt_text: The houses that are claimed to be mansions were all acquired before 1994 and the successive African National Congress-led government has just ensured maintenance of those residences to preserve their value and thus benefiting from the appreciation of property values..

src_text: Die samesmelting, wat die grootste sidervervaardiger in die land sal skep, is onderhewig aan 'n reeks vooraardes in openbare belang; dit sluit in die bevordering van verskaffer-ontwikkeling, instandhouding van plaaslike verkryging, bevordering van belegging in navorsing en ontwikkeling en verhoogde plaaslike vervaardigingskapasiteit.
tgt_text: Ministers and Deputy Ministers who use both State-provided houses pay rent in similar manner as parliamentarians do.

src_text: Die saamgesmelte entiteit sal ook werkerseienaarskap bevorder deur die opstel van 'n gedeelde eienaarskapsplan vir werkers, asook deur verteenwoordiging van werkers op direksies.
tgt_text: It would be unfair to expect Ministers and Deputy Ministers who do not have job security in their current positions to provide their own accommodation whilst in the service to the nation..     Vehicles used by Ministers and their Deputies are in line with the Ministerial Handbook and the value threshold is determined by the Minister of Finance in consultation with the Minister of Police on security features.

src_text: Monitering van vordering met vloedverligting.
tgt_text: The security features are an important element in the determination of the price threshold and recent unfortunate incidents of MECs losing their lives or being involved in serious car accidents emphasises the significance of the matter and should remove the matter from political opportunism.

src_text: Die Kabinet verwelkom die werk wat deur die Minister van Menslike Nedersettings, me Mmamoloko Kubayi en lede van die Menslike Nedersettings MinLUR onderneem is om vordering met die permanente hervestiging en huisvestingvan gesinne wat deur die 2022-vloede in KwaZulu-Natal geraak is, te monitor.
tgt_text: All members of Parliament are entitled to support staff who assist them in the execution of their work.

src_text: Dit val saam met die eerste herdenking van die verwoestende vloede wat die land in 2022 getref het.
tgt_text: The differences in the number of support staff in the offices of Ministers is result of the time specific Minister was appointed, as all staff are linked to the terms of office of specific Minister.

src_text: Wanvoorstellings oor die voordele van ministers en adjunkministers.
tgt_text: This is due to the fact that the Ministerial Handbook is living document that is reviewed continuously...

src_text: Die Kabinet het sy kommer uitgespreek oor die voortgesette wanvoorstelling van die voordele van ministers en adjunkministers soos uiteengesit in die Gids vir Lede van die Hoofbestuur.
tgt_text: The President has referred the current Ministerial Handbook to the Independent Commission for the Remuneration of Public Office Bearers, which already deals with the remuneration of all public office bearers to review     CABINET DECISIONS.

src_text: Dit gee ’n uiteensetting van die voordele, werkwyses en toelaes vir lede van die hoofbestuur om hul pligte doeltreffend uit te voer.
tgt_text: Draft Policy on Women in Sport.

src_text: Ministeriële behuisingsreëlings is 'n gevolg van die 1910-konsensus tydens die stigting van die Unie van Suid-Afrika, wat die drie hoofstede vir Suid-Afrika bepaal het, naamlik Pretoria as die regeringsetel, Bloemfontein as die setel van die regbank, en Kaapstad as die parlementêre setel.
tgt_text: Cabinet approved the gazetting of the draft Policy on Women in Sport for public comments.

src_text: Al die huise wat na bewering herehuise is, is voor 1994 bekom en die opvolgende African National Congress-geleide regering het die instandhouding van hierdie huise verseker om hul waarde te behou en sodoende uit die waardestyging van die eiendomme te baat.
tgt_text: The policy outlines set of measures that will promote and support women in sport and ensure programmes are in place to address gender disparities in sporting codes and structures..

src_text: Ministers en Adjunkministers wat staatsvoorsiende huise gebruik, betaal huur op 'n soortgelyke wyse as parlementslede.
tgt_text: It also addresses barriers to entry by women in sport such as lack of funding, sponsorship and inadequate remuneration.

src_text: Dit sal onregverdig wees om van ministers en adjunkministers wat nie werksekerheid in hul huidige posisies het nie te verwag om hul eie verblyf te voorsien terwyl hulle in diens van die nasie is.
tgt_text: The proposed policy intends to promote increased active participation of women in sport and leadership roles such as coaching and officiating..

src_text: Voertuie wat deur ministers en hul adjunkte gebruik word, is in ooreenstemming met die Ministeriële Handboek en die waardedrempel word deur die Minister van Finansies in oorleg met die Minister van Polisie oor sekuriteitseienskappe bepaal.
tgt_text: The policy recognises that increased participation of women in sport and leadership positions will drastically reduce and finally eradicate gender inequality and various forms of discrimination against women.

src_text: Die sekuriteitseienskappe is 'n belangrike element in die bepaling van die prysdrempel.
tgt_text: It also seeks to promote equity and ensure women receive respect or recognition on the professional front, including equal remuneration as their male counterparts.

tgt_text: Cabinet granted approval for South Africa to host the International Maternal and Newborn Health Conference in Cape Town from 8 to 11 May 2023, where more than 1 000 stakeholders from around the world will gather to accelerate solutions to improve maternal and new-born survival, and prevent stillbirths..     South Africa has made great progress towards achieving the United Nation’s (UN) Sustainable Development Goals targets for maternal and newborn health, and prevention of stillbirths.
